Research Experience

About

I am a final year BTech Information Technology student at College of Engineering, Pune (COEP). I am a system programming and embedded programming enthusiast with particular interests in understanding computer architecture concepts and studying about related domains. I have worked on embedded systems during my time at CSAT. Having been involved in the ongoing research in cube satellite systems aimed towards designing CSAT's second satellite has been an exhilirating experience!

I have been a member of COEP's Student Satellite Team (CSAT) for a period of almost four years now, and until recently, was the Communication Subsystem Lead there. I have internship experience at Barclays Plc and Promorphosis Pvt Ltd. I have also undertaken the roles of a Marketing and Finance Portfolio Coordinator and an Event Head for Predict-X in MindSpark, COEP's annual technical fest, and have played for COEP's Football Team B in Zest, it's annual sports fest.

DNSGuard

Developed a DNS Server that runs on localhost to block advertisements and malicious websites. Added a feature of periodic log backup from EC2 instance to S3 bucket using Linux logrotate utility.

  • Domain: Cyber Security

IoT Platform

Developed a bare minimum IoT platform using Mosquitto MQTT message broker, Node-RED flows, MySQL time-series DB, a rule engine, a REST API interface, and microservices.

  • Duration: Aug'19 - Dec'19
  • Domain: Internet of Things
  • Link: GitHub Repository

Summer Intern at Barclays Plc.

Implemented a functionality in Java to push test metrics data to a web application by parsing html post the regression pack run and configured a Jenkins job to automate the same. Developed a solution for excel file version control while resolving merge conflicts. Fixed a limitation in the regression suite not running via Browserstack due to a local file dependency on the Jenkins slave node.

  • Duration: May'19 - July'19
  • Domain: Software Integration Testing and Continuous Integration (CI)

Word Completion/Suggestion Feature in Gedit

Used the GTK C library to provide this functionality in the default GNOME graphical text editor.

  • Duration: Aug'17 - Dec'17
  • Domain: C and GTK Application Development
  • Link: GitHub Repository

Communication Subsystem member and then Lead in COEP's Student Satellite Team (CSAT)

Involved in the development of a non-interrupt based priority scheduler. Designed and implemented a custom protocol over Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART) to communicate between two ARM Cortex-M microcontrollers. Explored the UART and Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) modules of the same microcontroller. Co-authored two research papers at the 68th International Austronautical Congress 2017 (IAC'17).

  • Duration: Sept'16 - April'20
  • Domain: Embedded Systems
